page.title: 06EVENTS
page.content: Two girls from our school called Jayne Sadler and Jessica Turner went to the Essex Arms for a competition to choose a Gala Queen and Princess. It was in a lounge room and a man asked them questions. He said "Have you any pets or brothers and sisters?" They were both chosen, Jayne as the Gala Queen and Jessica as the Princess. For prizes they had a crown, bracelet and a blue and pink dress with a frill around the top and the bottom and a sash. When they walked down they felt scared. They were going to ride in a car without a roof but if it rained they would have the roof up. For the competition Jessica wore a white dress with puffy sleeves and Jayne wore a white dress. When Jayne got home her Mum did not believe that she had won.
